Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-red pottery vessel, fabric is light-grey in section, interior slightly grooved, exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip and remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text identifying contents.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393198) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393198)
